title: Fullhead foils
notes: Highlights or lowlights that cover over your full head

title: 1/2 head foils
notes: Highlighting service that covers your parting to the crown and down besides the ears

title: Herringbone parting foils
notes: Parting herringbone highlights concentrates on the top section of your hair where your parting is.
This herringbone technique gives you a much softer look when highlights start to grow out.

title: Personalised colour
notes: This package is tailored to your individual needs.
Whether it be a concern about grey regrowth or wanting a handful of highlights for brightness this package is the one for you.
